title: Fix completed agents being re-added after fadeout removal
description: Bug: completed agents keep reappearing as blue/lavender balls with permanent labels. Root cause: removeNode deletes from nodes map after fadeout, but server keeps sending completed agents in state snapshots. updateNode line 322 sees node missing, calls addNode, recreating a fresh node. Fix: track removed completed agents in a Set<string> called completedRemoved. In updateNode, if agent.state is completed and completedRemoved.has(agent.name), return early. In removeNode when completing is true, add to completedRemoved. Clear completedRemoved entries when a full state reset occurs (line ~790 where nodes are cleared). File: client/scene.ts.
close_reason: Closed
